The current project is a `Hello-world` of working with `{workflowr}` to publish Rmd-focused analyses. Take a look here for a list of github hosted R packages containing the term `phylogenetic` in the repo description:

[Phylogenetic R packages](https://cgpu.github.io/ggpackages/index.html)
